website_summaries.verdict: Nike updates an icon in the Nike Air Max 1 Ultra 2.0 Essential. It is a blend of its predecessor’s classic aesthetic and today’s latest technology. Described to be a lot lighter, more comfortable and flexible than previous models, the shoe also offers a different selection of colors for various looks.With its updated breathable mesh upper, this shoe can be a great choice during hot weather. Despite a few reported flaws, the shoe’s historical value and beneficial upgrades make copping a pair worthwhile.
pros: The Air Max 1 Ultra 2.0 Essential is described as very comfortable by a large number of reviewers
A substantial number of buyers appreciate the shoe’s stylishly classic design, in which some add that it could be worn with almost any outfit
The shoe looks and feels durable, based on a handful of wearers
Several purchasers express that the Air Max 1 Ultra 2.0 Essential is of great value for the price because of its good quality and superb design
A variety of colors are available for buyers to choose from
A few consumers disclose the fact that they bought several other colors after their first pair
Owning a pair of the Air Max 1 Ultra 2.0 Essential is like giving homage to its predecessor – the revolutionary Air Max 1 OG
Some users mention that the shoe feels so much lighter compared to its predecessor due to its updated mesh upper
One video reviewer states that the toe box creases less due to the updated upper made out of a softer and more flexible mesh material
cons: A significant number of purchasers express that the shoe feels slightly narrow in the forefoot
A small number of consumers report that the Air Max 1 Ultra 2.0 Essential looked whiter in photos than in person

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift so I cant really speak for comfort. They are nice looking, but expensive. By looking and holding the shoes I just see the cost of 130+. I would have spent that much for myself. It was a gift
customer_reviews.author: Little Snooters

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: If you have a quality shoe stretcher and wait 3 weeks wide open good these are gor japs or Chinese but if you stretch then for E wide to double they will work for narrow foot only if no stretch you will ouse your toes.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: order 1/2 size bigger than what you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: nursing student: needed a white shoe comfortable enough for 12 hr clincial shifts. i wear a 8 normally, but these run a bit small. Had to return and buy an 8.5. 8.5 fit nicely, overall decently comfortable. stitching looks a bit cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Gravalop

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Nike Air Max 1 has been a staple of my daily shoe choice for years. All my experiences have been positive until this one. At the big toes the fabric is tearing apart, and that after 6 months. Usually, I can get 2 years out of my Nike Air Max 1s before they are worn down. These seem of a lower quality of perhaps not the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate at all
customer_reviews.text: Feels fake looks sorta fake to and the sole is Grey not white the whole sole part feels like foam and the material feels like it can Be easily riped it honestly feels like a fake nike from walmart
customer_reviews.author: Rueben

customer_reviews.title: Good Air Maxes
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable but not as comfortable as the Nike Air Max BR. They could also use a little better coloring.
customer_reviews.author: DBAL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect color
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Shoes were actually all grey, which is what I wanted, pictures made them look lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for casual dress occasions and for walking.
customer_reviews.text: Wearing them right now. I love air max for th comfort and the style. Never out of date.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, fits really well, however it looks really small compared to my other shoes with same size.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Im sad
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is used and old and contains the remains of insects ... You are deceitful
customer_reviews.author: wesam salah

customer_reviews.title: Don't miss this if you want a perfect white sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers. A classic style with a fashionable taste, and feels comfortable when it comes to walking or playing sports.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Cai

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say anything coz I return it...I ordered d wrong color.
customer_reviews.author: Thess

product_meta.title: Nike Air Max 1 Ultra 2.0 Essential
product_meta.description:
Original Air Max 1 TrainersNike Max 1: a revolution



In 1987, the Nike Air Max debuted with visible air unit in the heel, allowing its fans more than just the feeling of air-sole comfort. Suddenly they could see the comfort too. And just a few years later, the next-generation Nike Air Max 90 became a hit with both athletes and collectors, offering eye-catching color combinations and exclusive comfort. When will you become an Air Max fan?



Everything you need in the Air Max 1



Upper material: leather / textile

Inner material: textile

Insole: textile

Lace up closure (6-hole)

TPU lace reinforcement

Swoosh design

Air Max logo at the tongue

Embroidered Nike logo at the heel

Visible AIR unit under the heel

Comfy OrthoLite insole

EVA midsole

Rubber outsole

Waffle profile
feature_bullets: Lace-up closure for an adjustable yet secure fit
